snippet: Vikram S. Pandit worked as Citigroup's chief executive for just under five years, earning about $56.4 million during that time. That was a good deal less than what other Wall Street chieftains made.
abstract: Vikram S. Pandit worked as Citigroup's chief executive for just under five years, earning about $56.4 million during that time. That was a good deal less than what other Wall Street chieftains made.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Pandit, a Low-Paid C.E.O. Among Wall Street Peers
